Selects a method to use when enforcing acoustic phonon sum rule.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values:
NONE       : No sum-rule correction will be applied.
RECIPROCAL : Correct dynamical matrix D(q) at each q using D(q=0).
REALSPACE  : Correct the real-space force constant matrix C(R).
REAL-RECIP : Correct C(R) in realspace followed by D(q) in reciprocal space.
MOLECULAR  : Correct D(0) using rotational as well as translational sum-rule.
MOLECULAR-1D : Correct D(0) for a linear molecule using rotational as well as translational sum-rule.
Default value : RECIPROCAL

calculate_born_charges.docstring:
Selects whether to compute Born effective charge tensors as part of a phonon or efield linear-response calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : TRUE

born_charge_sum_rule.docstring:
Selects whether to explicitly correct the Born effective charge tensor to enforce the sum rule that effective charges sum to zero.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : TRUE

calculate_raman.docstring:
Selects whether to compute Raman intensities as part of a phonon or efield linear-response calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

raman_range_low.docstring:
Lower limit of a frequency window for which Raman intensities will be calculated.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 0.0 eV

raman_range_high.docstring:
Upper limit of a frequency window for which Raman intensities will be calculated.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > RAMAN_RANGE_LOW
Default value : 1.0 eV

raman_method.docstring:
Selects the method for applying 2n+1 solver for Raman tensor calculation.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: DFPT or FINITEDISPLACEMENT
Default value : FINITEDISPLACEMENT

phonon_write_force_constants.docstring:
Selects whether to write out the real-space force constant matrix from a phonon supercell or interpolation calculation (to the <seedname>.castep file).
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

phonon_write_dynamical.docstring:
Selects whether to write out the reciprocal space dynamical matrices from a phonon  calculation (to the <seedname>.castep file).
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

efield_dfpt_method.docstring:
Selects the solver for Efield density functional perturbation theory.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: ALLBANDS(=VARIATIONAL) or DM(=GREEN) to select Gonze variational or Baroni Green function with DM solver.
Default value : ALLBANDS

efield_max_cg_steps.docstring:
The maximum number of conjugate gradient steps in EFIELD calculation before performing a SD reset.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 0
Default value : 0

efield_max_cycles.docstring:
The maximum number of SCF cycles in EFIELD calculation regardless of convergence.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 50

efield_convergence_win.docstring:
The LR convergence criteria must be met for EFIELD_CONVERGENCE_WIN iterations before acceptance.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 2
Default value :  3 if EFIELD_DFPT_METHOD=DM, or 2 otherwise

efield_energy_tol.docstring:
Tolerance for accepting convergence of the field constants during PHONON calculation. The difference between max and min E(2) values over efield_convergence_win iterations must be less than this.
NB This is an INTENSIVE parameter and has units of volume.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 10^-5 Ang**3

efield_calc_ion_permittivity.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to compute the zero-frequency dielectric permittivity based on the ionic response to electric fields. This requires a gamma-point phonon calculation in addition to the EFIELD linear response one.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : TRUE

efield_ignore_molec_modes.docstring:
Ignore the lowest lying (3,5,6) modes when computing the ionic contribution to the permittivity and polarizability.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: CRYSTAL, MOLECULE, LINEAR_MOLECULE
Default value : CRYSTAL

efield_freq_spacing.docstring:
Spacing of frequencies in calculation of frequency-dependent permittivity.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 1.0 cm^-1

efield_oscillator_q.docstring:
Oscillator Q-factor for line-shape broadening in calculation of frequency- dependent permittivity.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 50.0

thermo_calculate_helmholtz.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to calculate the Helmholtz free energy.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : TRUE

thermo_t_start.docstring:
The desired starting temperature for the thermodynamics calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 298 K

thermo_t_stop.docstring:
The desired final temperature for the thermodynamics calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) >= THERMO_T_START
Default value : 298 K

thermo_t_spacing.docstring:
The spacing between temperature values for the thermodynamics calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > (-epsilon)
Default value : THERMO_T_STOP - THERMO_T_START

thermo_t_npoints.docstring:
The number of points in the temperature interval for the thermodynamics calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 1
Default value : 2 if THERMO_T_STOP /= THERMO_T_START or 1 otherwise

wannier_spread_tol.docstring:
Tolerance for Wannier function spread minimisation at the Gamma point (Lambda = Silvestrelli Sigma).
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) >= 0.0
Default value : 10^-8

wannier_max_sd_steps.docstring:
The maximum number of steepest descent steps in the Wannier function calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 10000

wannier_sd_step.docstring:
Length of steepest descent step length in Wannier function spread minimisation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 1.0

wannier_print_cube.docstring:
The number of the (maximally localised) Wannier function to print out in .cube (+ .pdb) format file.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 0

wannier_spread_type.docstring:
Selects definition for Wannier function spread functional.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: VANDERBILT, RESTA
Default value : VANDERBILT

wannier_min_algor.docstring:
Spread minimisation algorithm: steepest descent or orbital rotations.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: SD, OR
Default value : OR

wannier_ion_moments.docstring:
Selects whether or not to compute ion multipole moments from maximally localised Wannier functions.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

wannier_ion_rmax.docstring:
A Wannier function belongs to an ion if its Wf centre is within a distance rmax from the ion centre.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 2.0 Bohr

wannier_ion_cut.docstring:
Selects whether or not to compute ion multipole moments from maximally localised Wannier functions using truncated integration in real space.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

wannier_ion_cut_fraction.docstring:
In the real-space integration for the calculation of ion moments only this fraction of ion density will be included.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: 0.0 < WANNIER_ION_CUT_FRACTION < 1.0
Default value : 0.999

wannier_restart.docstring:
Requires that the Wannier function calculation should start from the results of a previous calculation.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: INITIAL, FINAL, NONE, where:
INITIAL: restart from before the spread minimisation.
FINAL: restart from the end of the previous calculation
NONE: do not restart from previous calculation.
Default value : NONE

wannier_ion_cut_tol.docstring:
In the real-space truncated integration for the calculation of ion moments the truncation radius r_cut  for a given ion is determined by insisting that an ion-centred sphere should contain wannier_ion_cut_fraction of the total charge density of the ion, to within an accuracy wannier_ion_cut_tol * ion_density.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 10^-5

wannier_ion_cmoments.docstring:
Selects whether or not to compute ion multipole moments from Wannier function cumulant moments.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

magres_task.docstring:
Specifies which magnetic property to calculate.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: SHIELDING, EFG, NMR, GTENSOR, HYPERFINE, EPR, JCOUPLING
Default value : SHIELDING

magres_method.docstring:
Selects which method to use for the position operator.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: CRYSTAL, MOLECULAR, MOLECULAR3
Default value : CRYSTAL

magres_max_cg_steps.docstring:
The maximum number of conjugate gradient steps in MAGRES calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 1
Default value : 250

magres_convergence_win.docstring:
The magres convergence criteria must be met for MAGRES_CONVERGENCE_WIN iterations before acceptance.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 2
Default value : 2

magres_conv_tol.docstring:
Energy tolerance for accepting convergence during magres calculation.
The difference between max and min energy values over MAGRES_CONVERGENCE_WIN iterations must be less than this.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 10^-12 eV if MAGRES_METHOD=CRYSTAL or 10^-9 eV otherwise

magres_xc_functional.docstring:
The functional to use when calculating the exchange-correlation potential during a magres calculation.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: LDA, PW91, PBE, PBESOL, RPBE, WC, BLYP, ZERO, WDA.
In addition, we now support libXC and all the non-hybrid functionals therein.
Default value : XC_FUNCTIONAL if allowed or PBE otherwise

magres_xc_definition.docstring:
The functional to use when calculating the exchange-correlation potential during a magres calculation.
This version is a BLOCK keyword, with the flexibility to allow an arbitrary mixing of any of the basic MAGRES_XC_FUNCTIONAL components.
Basic format: a series of separate lines, each containing <func> <weight> where <func> is the appropriate kernel for either eXchange or Correlation or both and <weight> is supposed to add to 1.0 for both eXchange and Correlation.
Modifiable: restart only
Default value : set by XC_FUNCTIONAL

magres_max_sc_cycles.docstring:
The maximum number of self consistent cycles in MAGRES calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 1
Default value : 20

magres_jcoupling_task.docstring:
Selects which spin coupling terms to compute.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: FC, SPIN, ORBITAL, ALL
Default value : ALL

magres_write_response.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to write out the induced current to file.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

elnes_nextra_bands.docstring:
The number of extra bands in an optical matrix elements calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 0
Default value : 0

elnes_perc_extra_bands.docstring:
The percentage of extra bands in an optical matrix elements calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) >= 0.0
Default value : 0.0

elnes_nbands.docstring:
Determines the number of bands in an optical matrix elements calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= MAX(NUP,NDOWN)
Default value : NBANDS + (5*SQRT(NBANDS) or ELNES_NEXTRA_BANDS or ELNES_PERC_EXTRA_BANDS)

elnes_xc_functional.docstring:
The functional to use when calculating the exchange-correlation potential during an elnes calculation.
Allowed values: LDA, PW91, PBE, PBESOL, RPBE, WC, BLYP, ZERO, WDA.
In addition, we now support libXC and all the non-hybrid functionals therein.
Modifiable: restart only
Default value : set by XC_FUNCTIONAL

elnes_xc_definition.docstring:
The functional to use when calculating the exchange-correlation potential during an elnes calculation.
This version is a BLOCK keyword, with the flexibility to allow an arbitrary mixing of any of the basic ELNES_XC_FUNCTIONAL components.
Basic format: a series of separate lines, each containing <func> <weight> where <func> is the appropriate kernel for either eXchange or Correlation or both and <weight> is supposed to add to 1.0 for both eXchange and Correlation.
Modifiable: restart only
Default value : set by XC_FUNCTIONAL

elnes_eigenvalue_tol.docstring:
Tolerance for accepting convergence of a single eigenvalue/band during ELNES calculation. The difference between max and min energies over elec_convergence_win iterations must be less than this.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 10^-6 eV/eigenvalue

spectral_theory.docstring:
The level of theory to use when doing electronic spectroscopy calculations.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: DFT, TDDFT, G0W0
Default value : DFT

spectral_task.docstring:
The type of electronic spectrum to calculate.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: BANDSTRUCTURE, DOS, OPTICS, CORELOSS, ALL
Default value : BANDSTRUCTURE

spectral_max_iter.docstring:
Determines the maximum number of iterations to perform when calculating band structure.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 60

spectral_max_steps_per_iter.docstring:
The maximum number of steps to take per iteration in the electronic minimizer, before resetting to the steepest descents direction, when doing an electronic spectroscopy calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 5

spectral_nextra_bands.docstring:
The number of extra bands in an electronic spectroscopy calculation above NBANDS.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 0
Default value : 0

spectral_perc_extra_bands.docstring:
The percentage of extra bands in an electronic spectroscopy calculation above NBANDS.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) >= 0.0
Default value : 0.0

spectral_nbands.docstring:
Determines the number of bands per k-point in electronic spectroscopy calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 0
Default value : NBANDS + (5*SQRT(NBANDS) or SPECTRAL_NEXTRA_BANDS or SPECTRAL_PERC_EXTRA_BANDS)

spectral_eigenvalue_tol.docstring:
Tolerance for accepting convergence of a single eigenvalue/band during electronic spectroscopy calculation. The difference between max and min energies over elec_convergence_win iterations must be less than this.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 10^-6 eV/eigenvalue

spectral_xc_functional.docstring:
The functional to use when calculating the exchange-correlation potential during an electronic spectroscopy calculation.
Allowed values: LDA, PW91, PBE, PBESOL, RPBE, WC, BLYP, LDA-C, LDA-X, ZERO, HF, PBE0, B3LYP, HSE03, HSE06, EXX-X, HF-LDA, EXX, EXX-LDA, SHF, SX, SHF-LDA, SX-LDA, WDA, SEX, SEX-LDA.
In addition, we now support libXC and all the additional functionals therein.
Modifiable: restart only
Default value : set by XC_FUNCTIONAL

spectral_xc_definition.docstring:
The functional to use when calculating the exchange-correlation potential during a spectral calculation.
This version is a BLOCK keyword, with the flexibility to allow an arbitrary mixing of any of the basic SPECTRAL_XC_FUNCTIONAL components.
Basic format: a series of separate lines, each containing <func> <weight> where <func> is the appropriate kernel for either eXchange or Correlation or both and <weight> is supposed to add to 1.0 for both eXchange and Correlation.
Modifiable: restart only
Default value : set by XC_FUNCTIONAL

spectral_re_est_k_scrn.docstring:
(See description of NLXC_RE_EST_K_SCRN). If this is true then the screening length will be re-estimated from the density before an electronic spectroscopy calculation.
(If NLXC_RE_EST_K_SCRN is also true then this should have no effect.)
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

spectral_write_eigenvalues.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to write out additional eigenvalue information to .castep file.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : TRUE

tddft_num_states.docstring:
The number of excited states in a TDDFT calculation.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: (any integer) > TDDFT_SELECTED_STATE
Default value : 0

tddft_selected_state.docstring:
The selected excited state for use during geometry optimisation or molecular dynamics.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 0
Default value : 0

tddft_eigenvalue_tol.docstring:
Tolerance for accepting convergence of a single eigenvalue/state during tddft calculation. The difference between max and min energies over TDDFT_CONVERGENCE_WIN iterations must be less than this.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 10^-6 eV/eigenvalue

tddft_convergence_win.docstring:
The TDDFT convergence criteria must be met for TDDFT_CONVERGENCE_WIN iterations before acceptance.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 2
Default value : 2

tddft_max_iter.docstring:
The maximum number of iterations to take during a TDDFT calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) > TDDFT_CONVERGENCE_WIN
Default value : 50 for Davidson solver, 200 for CG solver

tddft_nextra_states.docstring:
The number of extra states in a TDDFT calculation above TDDFT_NUM_STATES, these extra states are not checked for eigenvalue convergence.
Note: only used if TDDFT_EIGENVALUE_METHOD = DAVIDSON
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 0
Default value : set by floor(SQRT(TDDFT_NUM_STATES))

tddft_xc_functional.docstring:
The functional to use when calculating the exchange-correlation kernel during a TDDFT calculation.
Allowed values: LDA, PW91, PBE, PBESOL, RPBE, WC, BLYP, LDA-C, LDA-X, ZERO, HF, PBE0, B3LYP, HSE, HSE06, EXX-X, HF-LDA, EXX, EXX-LDA, SHF, SX, SHF-LDA, SX-LDA, WDA, SEX, SEX-LDA.
In addition, we now support libXC and all the additional functionals therein.
Modifiable: restart only
Default value : set by XC_FUNCTIONAL

tddft_xc_definition.docstring:
The functional to use when calculating the exchange-correlation potential during a tddft calculation.
This version is a BLOCK keyword, with the flexibility to allow an arbitrary mixing of any of the basic TDDFT_XC_FUNCTIONAL components.
Basic format: a series of separate lines, each containing <func> <weight> where <func> is the appropriate kernel for either eXchange or Correlation or both and <weight> is supposed to add to 1.0 for both eXchange and Correlation.
Modifiable: restart only
Default value : set by XC_FUNCTIONAL

tddft_method.docstring:
The method by which to approach TDDFT.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: HUTTER, LANCZOS_CHAIN, DYSON
Default value : HUTTER

tddft_eigenvalue_method.docstring:
Selects which method is used to obtain the eigenvalues of the TDDFT matrix.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: CG, DAVIDSON
Default value : DAVIDSON

tddft_approximation.docstring:
Selects whether or not the Tamm-Dancoff approximation is used in a TDDFT calculation
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TAMM-DANCOFF, FULL
Default value : TAMM-DANCOFF

tddft_position_method.docstring:
Selects which method to use for the position operator in TDDFT.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: CRYSTAL, MOLECULAR
The CRYSTAL method is only compatible with (semi)local XC functionals
Default value : MOLECULAR

ga_pop_size.docstring:
Number of distinct configurations in the GA population.
Modifiable: never
Allowed values: (any even integer) >=2
Default value : NUM_ATOMS if even or NUM_ATOMS+1 otherwise

ga_max_gens.docstring:
Maximum number of generations to evolve population for regardless of convergence.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 3*NUM_ATOMS

ga_mutate_rate.docstring:
Probability of a mutation for each degree of freedom after GA crossover.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: 0.0 < GA_MUTATE_RATE < 1.0
Default value : 0.15

ga_mutate_amp.docstring:
Amplitude (+/-) of a mutation if it occurs after GA crossover.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) >= 0.0
Default value : 1.0 Ang

ga_spin_mutate_rate.docstring:
Probability of a spin mutation for each ion after GA crossover.
Modifiable: unknown
Allowed values: 0.0 < GA_SPIN_MUTATE_RATE < 1.0
Default value : 0.15

ga_spin_mutate_amp.docstring:
Amplitude (+/-) of a spin mutation if it occurs after GA crossover.
Modifiable: unknown
Allowed values: (any) >= 0.0
Default value : 1.0 bohr magnetons

ga_fixed_n.docstring:
Specifies whether or not the number of atoms in each GA child is constant or  allowed to vary.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : TRUE

ga_bulk_slice.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to do a 3D or 2D slice in GA crossover.
Modifiable: never
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : TRUE

excited_state_scissors.docstring:
Effectively adds an offset to conduction-band eigenvalues as empirical correction for LDA/GGA underestimation of band-gaps.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any)
Default value : 0.0

boundary_type.docstring:
Determine boundary conditions for electrostatic embedding.
Can be periodic, open (for embedding or solvation) or zero (metallic).
Modifiable: restart
Allowed values: PERIODIC, OPEN, ZERO
Default value : PERIODIC

use_smeared_ions.docstring:
Activates smeared (Gaussian) ion representation in electrostatics with multi-grid solver.
Modifiable: restart
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

mg_fd_order.docstring:
Order of the multi-grid finite difference solver for electrostatics.
If MG_FD_ORDER=2 then defect correction is not used.
If MG_FD_ORDER>2 then higher order operator is used to compute the defect correction.
Modifiable: restart
Allowed values: 2 <= (even integer) <= 12
Default value : 8

mg_padding.docstring:
Allows control of padding (number of additional points on each side of cell) for multi-grid solver.
Grid will be rounded up to satisfy the multi-grid solver grid constraints.
A value of -1 means use default value from size of coarse graining blocks.
Modifiable: restart
Allowed values: (any integer) > -1
Default value : -1

dielec_emb_cavity_type.docstring:
Determine type of cavity for electrostatic embedding.
Can be FIXED (ie set by initial charge density) or SELF_CONSISTENT (updated during calculation).
Modifiable: restart
Allowed values: FIXED, SELF_CONSISTENT
Default value : FIXED

dielec_emb_func_method.docstring:
Determine type of dielectric function used in electrostatic embedding.
Can be FG (Fattebert-Gygi for density-dependent dielectric) or UNIFORM (for vacuum etc).
Modifiable: restart
Allowed values: FG or UNIFORM
Default value : FG if TASK=AUTOSOLVATION or UNIFORM otherwise

dielec_emb_param_set.docstring:
Determine set of parameter values of dielectric function to use in electrostatic embedding.
Modifiable: restart
Allowed values: DEFAULT, FGS2006, MPSM2011_LB, MPSM2011_HB
Default value : DEFAULT if DIELEC_EMB_FUNC_METHOD=UNIFORM or MPSM2011_LB otherwise

dielec_emb_bulk_permittivity.docstring:
Relative bulk permittivity for electrostatic embedding.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) >0.0
Default value : 78.54 (RTP water) if DIELEC_EMB_FUNC_METHOD=FG or 1.0 (vacuum) otherwise

write_formatted_dielec_perm.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to write out the final dielectric function to formatted file.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

implicit_solvent_apolar_term.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to calculate apolar effects in dielectric embedding / implicit solvent.
Modifiable: restart
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

implicit_solvent_surface_tension.docstring:
Specifies surface tension of the solvent used in apolar term in dielectric embedding / implicit solvent.
Modifiable: restart
Allowed values: (any) >0.0
Default value : 4.7624E-5 Ha/bohr^2 (RTP water)

implicit_solvent_rescale_apolar.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to rescale the apolar effects in dielectric embedding / implicit solvent.
Modifiable: restart
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : TRUE

devel_code.docstring:
Private string for developers only - a way to access test functionality at runtime.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any)
Default value : <empty>
